backend/main.mo: Defines the backend actor with authorization mixin and all core types for users, sessions, servers, channels, roles, messages, and audit logs.
feature_evidence.json: Lists implemented features with evidence, associated files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten short summaries of numerous frontend files describing UI and logic responsibilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme variables and global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main UI flow deciding between loading, login, or authenticated layout while rendering global providers and connection banner.
frontend/src/auth/AuthProvider.tsx: Authentication context handling session restoration, validation, login, logout, and backend connection failures with initialization timeout.
frontend/src/auth/sessionStorage.ts: Utility for saving, loading, validating, and clearing persisted auth session data.
frontend/src/auth/useAuth.ts: Simple hook exposing the AuthProvider context.
Provides a centered auth page layout with logo, title, optional description, and child content.
frontend/src/components/channels/Categor: Renders a category with text/voice channels, drag-and-drop ordering, and an optional create-channel dialog.
frontend/src/components/channels/CreateC: Dialog for creating a new channel category with validation and backend action guarding.
Dialog for creating text or voice channels in a category with type selection and backend checks.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChatCompose: Message composer for sending text channel messages with send button, shortcuts, and backend validation.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChatView.ts: Displays messages for the selected text channel with auto-scroll and an input composer.
frontend/src/components/chat/MessageItem: Renders a single chat message with avatar, author info, timestamp, and role-based color styling.
frontend/src/components/discovery/Discov: Server discovery UI that filters community servers by search and supports joining them.
frontend/src/components/discovery/Server: Displays a server preview card with name, description, member count, and a join button.
frontend/src/components/dms/DMHomeView.t: Shows the DM home screen or friends list based on navigation, with an empty state for no DMs.
frontend/src/components/friends/FriendRo: Renders a friend's avatar, name, status, and action buttons including messaging and dropdown options.
frontend/src/components/friends/FriendsH: Provides tabs for managing friends, pending requests, and adding new friends using principal IDs.
frontend/src/components/layout/DesktopSh: Desktop layout wrapping server rail, channel sidebar, main content, and optional member list.
frontend/src/components/layout/MainConte: Chooses which main view to show based on navigation state, including chat, DMs, discovery, and settings.
frontend/src/components/layout/MobileShe: Mobile layout using sliding sheets for servers, channels, and members, with main content and top bar.
frontend/src/components/layout/Responsiv: Switches between mobile and desktop layouts based on screen width.
frontend/src/components/members/MemberLi: Shows a scrollable list of server members with avatars, usernames, and role-colored display names.
frontend/src/components/nav/ChannelSideb: Displays server categories and channels with admin reordering, expansion state, and server settings access.
frontend/src/components/nav/MobileTopBar: Top bar for mobile navigation with buttons for servers, channels, members, and user settings.
frontend/src/components/nav/ServerRail.t: Renders the left-side server rail with home navigation, ordered server icons, and a button to create servers, using navigation and backend guard state.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Provides a dialog for first‑time profile setup, allowing the user to enter a display name and submit it via a mutation.
frontend/src/components/profile/RoleAssi: Displays and manages role assignments for a server member, supporting toggling roles with pending-state handling.
frontend/src/components/profile/UserProf: Shows a full user profile overlay with avatar, banner, details, roles, and optional role‑management controls.
frontend/src/components/servers/CreateSe: Dialog for creating a new server with name and description inputs, integrating backend action guards and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/servers/ServerIc: Renders a server's icon or a fallback initial inside a styled square used in the server list.
frontend/src/components/settings/ServerS: Dialog component for creating text or voice channels, handling form inputs, category selection, and mutation calls.
Dialog allowing users to move a channel to another category, showing available targets and triggering a move callback.
Panel for selecting a server member, viewing their roles, and opening a dialog to manage assigned roles.
Displays server audit log entries with formatted metadata and sorting, handling loading and empty states.
Manages server channel ordering, movement, and creation dialogs using persisted ordering and admin permissions.
Page for editing server settings like description, icon, banner, and community mode, with save functionality.
UI panel for selecting a server member and viewing/managing their assigned roles, including opening a role assignment dialog.
Displays server roles, allows creating new roles with permissions, and includes a panel to assign roles to members.
Main layout for server settings with a sidebar for page selection and dynamic content rendering for settings pages.
frontend/src/components/settings/UserSet: Lets users change UI theme and adjust text scale via radio buttons and a slider.
Profile editing page allowing users to update personal details, username, and view account email.
Main container for user settings, handling navigation between profile and appearance pages and providing logout functionality.
frontend/src/components/system/BackendCo: Shows connection status to the backend with loading, error, and retry instructions.
Static stage channel view displaying speakers, audience members, and a Raise Hand button.
Renders a voice channel UI showing participants, connection status, and join/leave controls using backend voice hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user identity, refetching dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendActionGuard: Provides a simple guard indicating whether backend actions should be disabled based on connection state.
Validates backend connectivity by combining safe actor initialization with a health check and exposes connection status.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication state, login, logout, and identity persistence via an auth client.
frontend/src/hooks/useIsMobile.ts: Tracks whether the viewport width is below a given breakpoint to detect mobile layout.
frontend/src/hooks/useLogout.ts: Logs the user out through the auth provider and clears all React Query cache.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines numerous typed backend data queries and mutations with error handling and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useSafeActor.ts: Safely initializes an authenticated or anonymous backend actor with retry logic and non-fatal access control setup.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables, light mode, global styles, and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/LoginScreen.tsx: Implements a login and registration screen with form state, validation, and error handling using the useAuth hook.
frontend/src/state/navigation.ts: Provides a navigation context managing current view, selected server/channel, UI panels, and related setters.
frontend/src/state/notifications.ts: Manages notification override settings in localStorage and checks mute status for servers and channels.
frontend/src/state/settings.ts: Provides a settings context with theme, UI, notification, and keybind preferences persisted in localStorage.
frontend/src/utils/channelOrdering.ts: Utilities to merge, apply, and build channel and category ordering from server data and persisted settings.
frontend/src/utils/hideElementByXPath.ts: Removes a specific DOM element by XPath and sets up a mutation observer to keep it removed.
frontend/src/utils/roleColor.ts: Validates and sanitizes hex colors and provides contrast calculations for role color styling.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using URLSearchParams and sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/withTimeout.ts: Wraps a promise with a timeout, rejecting if it does not resolve in the specified time.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, layout, animations, and loading typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing current state, known issues, and implemented features for handling app loading and backend connection behavior.
